articles.description: The Heat make it two on the trot and snap the Thunder's five-game winning streak
articles.content:
By Joe, the Heat storm past Thunder at the Gabba
The match in a tweet: Burns returns! Heat make it two in a row as 'The Joe Bros' get it done against the Thunder #BBL10
The score: Sydney Thunder 8-… [+3527 chars]
